post.description:
<!-- theme: warning -->
> ðŸ“˜ **Scopes required**:
> - quote:write

This endpoint will allow you to generate a quote for a Direct property. The quote includes all the financials and a link to our booking flow allowing you to redirect the user to complete the booking.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the property to get a quote for.

guest_details.description: The details of the primary guest

promo_code.description: A promo code to apply to the quote

booking_url.description: The url to initiate the guest booking flow.

taxes.description: All the taxes applicable to the quote.

fees.description: All the fees applicable to the quote.

discounts.description: Any discounts applicable to the quote.

sub_total.description: The total price of the quote. This is the accommodation + fees + taxes - discounts.

total_fees.description: The combined total price of the fees for the quote.

total.description: The total price of the quote. This is the accommodation + fees + taxes - discounts.

total_without_taxes.description: The total price of the quote without taxes. This is the accommodation + fees - discounts.

get.description:
> ðŸ“˜ **Available includes**:
> 
> - guest
> - user
> - financials (required: `financials:read` scope)
> - listings (required: `listing:read` scope)  
> - properties (required: `property:read` scope)
> - review (required: `reviews:read` scope)

<!-- theme: warning -->
> We will default to reservations with check-in dates in the next 2 weeks if at least one of these query parameters are not provided:
> - `start_date`
> - `end_date`
> - `date_query`

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number you would like to retrieve

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to include per page.

parameters.name: properties[]
parameters.description: Array of property UUIDs to query for.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Find reservations with check-in/check-out dates after this day.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Find reservations with check-in/check-out dates before this day.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated values, any of: financials,financialsV2,guest,properties,listings

parameters.name: date_query
parameters.description: Configure whether to use your date values to search by 'checkin' or 'checkout'.

post.description:
<!-- theme: warning -->
> ðŸ“˜ **Scopes required:**
> 
> - message:write
> Please write to team-platform@hospitable.com in order to get this scope added to your token.


> â—ï¸ **Rate Limits**: 
> - Only 2 messages per minute can be sent to a single reservation
> - Only 50 messages can be sent every 5 minutes

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the reservation

body.description:
Text body of the message to send. Note:
- HTML is not supported.
- `/n` is parsed for line breaks.

images.description:
The URL location of any images to attach to the message.

- Maximum of 3 images.
- The maximum filesize is 5MB.

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: This is the conversation_id.

> - Only 50 messages can be sent every 5 minutes

parameters.name: uuid

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the inquiry

body.description:
Text body of the message to send. Note:
- HTML is not supported.
- `/n` is parsed for line breaks.

images.description:
The URL location of any images to attach to the message.

- Maximum of 3 images.
- The maximum filesize is 5MB.
- Airbnb does not support attachments on Inquries!

400.description: Booking.com inquiries don't always allow messaging. See [Booking.com's Partner Hub article on pre-booking messaging](https://partner.booking.com/en-us/hosts/pre-booking-messaging).

reason_phrase.example: Messaging is not enabled for this Booking.com thread.

message.example: Messaging is not enabled for this Booking.com thread.

location.description: The location of the reservation api for the new reservation

reason_phrase.example: This Inquiry is now a Reservation and can be retrieved by the Reservation API. See the location header.
